title: BookWyrm
short_description: BookWyrm's flagship instance: Talk about books, track your reading, and find out what your friends are reading, on your own terms.
description:
Talk about books, track your reading, and find out what your friends are reading, on your own terms.

BookWyrm is ad-free, anti-corporate, and federated. You can seamlessly follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances, and on services like Mastodon.

title: Wyrms.de
short_description: The Dispossessed and everything else.
description:
Welcome to wyrms.de, an Bookwyrm instance inspired by The Dispossessed!

English 🢒

Reading and discussing

Wyrms.de is part of the Bookwyrm network - ad free, federated, open source and non profit platforms. You can interact with users from different Bookwyrm websites and other ActivityPub platforms like mastodon.

Wyrms.de is inspired by Ursula Le Guin's The Dispossessed. The green circle is the Circle of life that was used as Odo's symbol in the novel. The mascot is done by @sajan@mastodon.art and connects the Bookwyrm with the Circle of Life.

Deutsch 🢒

Lesen und darüber austauschen

Wyrms.de ist Teil des Bookwyrm Netzwerks - werbefreie, föderierte, open source Plattformen ohne gewinnorientierte Betreiber. Du kannst hier mit Nutzer:innen unterschiedlicher Bookwyrmseiten sowie anderer ActivityPub-Plattformen wie Mastodon kommunizieren!

Wyrms.de ist von Ursula Le Guins The Dispossessed inspiriert. Der grüne Kreis ist der Circle of Life, welcher in dem Buch als Zeichen Odos verwendet wurde. Das Maskottchen wurde von @sajan@mastodon.art kreiert und verbindet den Bookwyrm mit dem Circle of Life.

title: Dans Mon Catalogue
description: Dans Mon Catalogue is a tiny bookwyrm instance where people can socially-but-not-too-socially review books. It is a part of the fediverse that uses activitypub.

title: MXHDR BookWyrm
short_description: MXHDR BookWyrm instance
description: This is the private Bookwyrm instance of MXHDRM. Feel free to create an account. Support at Matrix Support Channel Instance Admin is https://books.mxhdr.net/user/maxheadroom

title: Žiurkikės
short_description: Lietuviškai skaitantys knygų graužikai / Lithuanian book lovers
description: Laisviems skaitytojams

title: Kirjakasa
short_description: Tervetuloa pienimuotoiseen, kotikutoiseen ja jäsentensä turvallisuutta ja hyvinvointia vaalivaan lukijayhteisöön!
description:
Tervetuloa pienimuotoiseen, kotikutoiseen ja jäsentensä turvallisuutta ja hyvinvointia vaalivaan lukijayhteisöön!

Lue käyttöehtomme ennen kuin pyydät kutsulinkkiä.

title: Moé for Solarpunk Books
short_description: We are collecting books and dreaming about a solarpunk utopia.
description: This instance is a companion to our Mastodon instance at solarpunk.moe. Please join us in our literary journey!

title: Velha Estante
short_description: Uma instância em português do Bookwyrm.
description:
A Velha Estante faz parte da BookWyrm, uma rede de comunidades independentes e autodirigidas para leitores. Embora você possa interagir perfeitamente com usuários em qualquer lugar da rede BookWyrm, essa comunidade é única.

Acompanhe sua leitura, fale sobre livros, escreva resenhas e descubra o que ler em seguida. Sempre livre de anúncios, anti-corporativa e orientada para a comunidade, a Velha Estante é um software em escala humana, projetado para permanecer pequeno e pessoal. Se você tiver solicitações de recursos, relatórios de bugs ou grandes sonhos, entre em contato e faça-se ouvir.

title: The Library of the Uncommons
short_description: The Library of the Uncommons is a gathering place for those seeking to expand their literary horizons and share in their journey with others.
description: The Library of the Uncommons is a gathering place for those seeking to expand their literary horizons and share in their journey with others. No one genre is favored here in particular; readers are simply encouraged to explore that which excites them.

title: bookrastinating.com
short_description: a social book review site for people who procrastinate on reading or procrastinate by reading
description:
Procrastinators and Book Lovers Unite!

Do you have a huge book backlog? Do you avoid doing things just to read? Do you read just to avoid doing things? Bookrastinating is here for you.

Bookrastinating is ad-free, anti-corporate, and federated. You can seamlessly follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances, and on services like Mastodon.

Follow us on Mastodon for updates: bookrastinating@citrus.farm

title: Gatti Ninja
short_description: Istanza romana/italiana
description:
Benvenuti


L'istanza Bookwyrm di Gatti Ninja è un social orientato alla lettura, alla recensione dei libri, alla condivisione delle librerie e alla creazione di comunità letterarie.

Potrete trovare spunti di lettura e di discussione, come creare una vostra lista di libri da leggere basandovi anche sui suggerimenti degli altri utenti. Leggere è sapere, ed il sapere rende liberi. Proprio per questo questa istanza non raccoglie i vostri dati, non vi traccia e non vi profila, non troverete pubblicità ed interagirete sempre e solo con esseri umani.
L'istanza è federata, quindi potete seguire e postare anche i contenuti su Mastodon, pleroma e tutto il fediverso.

Leggete il codice di comportamento per capire cosa potete e non potete fare.

title: Rambling Readers
short_description: Rambling Readers is a friendly community of book lovers. You can track your reading, talk about books, write reviews, and discover what to read next. We are UK based.
description:
Rambling Readers is a friendly community of book lovers. You can track your reading, talk about books, write reviews, and discover what to read next.

We are a UK based instance of BookWyrm. Anyone is welcome to join and no particular genre is favoured. You can follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances and on Mastodon.

We are committed for the long term to the Bookwyrm project, to maintaining the Rambling Readers instance, and to ensuring a responsive and reliable user experience.

If you have any questions email admin@ramblingreaders.org. Follow us on Mastodon for updates.

title: Orreadi
short_description: Track the books you read orreadi and find out what your friends orreadi read.
description:
Orreadi is a portmanteau of the Singaporean English ('Singlish') word 'orreddi' and 'read'. The word 'orreddi' is itself the Singlish (mis)pronunciation of the word "already". Orreadi therefore helps you track all the books you read orreadi and get ideas for what to read next based on what your friends have read orreadi.

Orreadi is hosted and administered in Singapore and welcomes users from across the world.

If you've come from Goodreads or Librarything, yes, Orreadi is a lot like those platforms in that it is in essence a book social network and recommendation site. The difference is that Orreadi runs on open source software called BookWyrm and is a part of the Fediverse. You can seamlessly follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances, and on other Fediverse services like Mastodon and Pixelfed.

title: Lectura Social
short_description: Lecturas en español, sin dejar de lado catalán, gallego, euskera, asturiano, aragonés o aranés. Mira los detalles en el link "Más información" y escríbenos. REGISTRO ABIERTO (con la condición de compartir gastos).
description:
Es posible leer y COMPARTIR de forma libre, sin contribuir al modelo de negocio de ninguna empresa, sin formar parte de un engranaje de extracción de datos. Con respeto por las personas.

El objetivo de Lectura Social es proporcionar un lugar en internet para las personas que leen en español en todo el mundo. También son bienvenidas las referencias en gallego, catalán, euskera, asturiano, aragonés o aranés, puesto que somos capaces de moderar su contenido y no existen (de momento) instancias específicas para estas comunidades lingüísticas. Creemos que dar voz y presencia a más culturas redunda en beneficio de todas las personas. No excluimos lecturas otros idiomas, pero animamos a que reseñas y comentarios sean en las lenguas señaladas anteriormente.

Lectura Social es un espacio que se mantiene gracias a las aportaciones de las personas de la comunidad. Hemos creado tres planes para todos los bolsillos, de 0.5, 1.5 y 2 euros al mes. Puedes adquirir una suscripción anual en nuestro Ko-fi, ahora con descuento inicial (0.4, 1.25 y 1.66 euros al mes). Una vez nos llegue el pago, te enviaremos la invitación a la comunidad en menos de 24h.

title: ComeLibros Club
short_description: La red social del Club de Lectura con más hambre
description:
🥄Somos una instancia de BookWyrm para gente que devora libros 🥄

Idiomas recomendados de la instancia:

  • Castellano
  • Galego
  • Català
  • Euskera
  • Asturiano
  • Aranès
  • Inglés

title: Plaerdemavida
short_description: Un lloc on trobar aquell llibre en català introbable a la xarxa! Aquesta instància està creada i pensada pels lectors en català del fedivers. Un lloc on ajuntar-nos i compartir les dèries lectores.
description:
Llegeix, troba i comparteix en català!


Un lloc on trobar els llibres en català a la xarxa! Aquesta instància està creada i pensada pels lectors en català del fedivers. Un lloc on ajuntar-nos i compartir les dèries lectores.

title: Paperjale.eus
short_description: Paperjale.eus librea, soziala eta federatua da. Liburuez eta literaturaz euskaraz aritzeko lekua.
description:
Euskal irakurleak eta liburu maitaleak batu gaitezen!

Pilatutako liburu asko dituzu? Noizbait irakurri nahi dituzu? Euskaraz gehiago irakurri nahi duzu? Ez daukazu zer irakurri eta inspirazio bila ari zara? Bada, Paperjale.eus zuretzat da.

Paperjale.eus librea, soziala eta federatua da. Liburuez eta literaturaz euskaraz aritzeko lekua. Gainontzeko BookWyrm instantzietako erabiltzaileekin harremanetan egon zaitezke, baita fedibertsoko beste kide batzuekin ere, hala nola, Mastodon, Pleroma...

Jarrai gaitzazu Mastodonen informazio gehiago izateko: @abaraska@mastodon.eus

title: pnpde.social Bücherwurm
short_description: pnpde.social Bücherwurm ist der perfekte Ort für alle, die ihre Leidenschaft für Bücher - insbesondere, aber nicht nur Rollenspielbücher - teilen möchten und Wert auf Inklusion legen.
description:
pnpde.social Bücherwurm gehört zum BookWyrm-Netzwerk. Das ist ein soziales Netzwerk zur Verfolgung deiner Lektüre. Ein Ort, um über Bücher zu sprechen und Bücher zu besprechen. Ein Ort um ein Angebot zu entdecken, was du als nächstes lesen könntest.

BookWyrm-Benutzer*innen können kleinen, vertrauenswürdigen Gemeinschaften wie dem Bücherwurm beitreten, und diese Gemeinschaften können sich untereinander verbinden und mit anderen ActivityPub-Diensten wie Mastodon und Pleroma interagieren.

pnpde.social Bücherwurm ist der perfekte Ort für alle, die ihre Leidenschaft für Bücher – insbesondere, aber nicht nur Rollenspielbücher – teilen möchten. Ob ihr auf Papier lest oder auf einem Display, oder ob ihr euch die Bücher vorlesen lasst – all das spielt hier keine Rolle. Hauptsache, die Inhalte können euch so begeistern, dass ihr eure Erfahrungen mit uns teilen möchtet!

title: We Loved Your Book So Much We Ate It
short_description: A snailhuddle freestyle bookclub.
description:
This is snailhuddle’s BookWyrm site.

Its logo depicts printed matter which has been subjected to a voracious readership of actual snails.

The title We Loved Your Book So Much We Ate It refers to an anecdote of Maurice Sendak’s, from an interview with Terry Gross — ‘Sendak on Childhood.’, Fresh Air, 15 April 1986. The story comes towards the end of the recording, between 26:50–27:48.

To those of you signing up ⸺

Please set your password with great care, and keep a dependable record of it. The system cannot actually send you assistance in the event of a forgotten password (even if it claims that it does). However, if you get in touch and ask for help, admins can (slowly).

Invite codes to WLYBSMWAI are typically issued with one month’s validity, for registering a single account. If your registration link has expired or otherwise does not seem to work, please request another.

title: Outside of a Dog
short_description: A generalist BookWyrm instance in Australia. All languages welcome. Audiobooks are books.
description:
Outside of a Dog is a generalist Bookwyrm instance. We welcome users from all over the world, commenting on books in any language. Audiobooks are books. Comics are books. Cookbooks are books.

Please read our Code of Conduct to see if this instance is a suitable fit for you.

Outside of a Dog is operated by @futzle@old.mermaid.town.

title: Bolha.review
short_description: This is the bookwyrm instance of bolha.io collective :)
description: Welcome, this is the bookwyrm of bolha.io collective | Join using the invite https://bolha.review/invite/WNPG6KQ2

title: BookWyrm francophone
short_description: Communauté francophone
description:
Petite instance francophone sans prétention. Je la souhaite généraliste et je veillerai à ce que le nombre d'inscrits ne compromette pas la stabilité du service.
Si vous n'avez pas l'intention d'utiliser (majoritairement) la langue française pour vos publications, je vous invite à rejoindre un autre logis sur le réseau, pour le confort de nos hôtes.
Merci beaucoup et bonne lecture.

title: Bouquins
short_description: Instance bookwyrm francophone de gauche.
description:
Bienvenue sur Bouquins de Zbeul!

Cette instance Bookwyrm est destinée à des lecteurices francophones pour tous types de lectures, mais avec l'idée de permettre des discussions et partages autour de valeurs de justices sociales et de lutte contre les discriminations (des valeurs de gauche quoi). 

Cette instance est administrée par taziden@bouquins.zbeul.fr et bob@bouquins.zbeul.fr.

title: SFBA Book Club
short_description: Book Club of the SFBA.social community. For readers from and interested in the San Francisco Bay Area.
description:
Talk about books, track your reading, and find out what your friends are reading, on your own terms.


BookWyrm is ad-free, anti-corporate, and federated. You can seamlessly follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances, and on services like Mastodon.

This Bookwyrm instance is run by the SFBA.social team. Find out more on our community hub.

description: This instance has no description.

description: This is a Norwegian instance of [Bookwyrm](https://joinbookwyrm.com). A privacy-friendly place to share the books we love!

title: 넷스피어펍
short_description: 책을 읽고서 평이나 주석을 남기기도 하고, 모임도 만들 수 있는 한국어 BookWyrm 서
description:
책을 읽고서 서평이나 의견을 공유하며 정리하는

전세계의 BookWyrm 서버와 도서 정보를 연계해요.

title: BookWyrm.world
short_description: A generic Bookworm instance for everyone to use
description:
A generic Bookworm instance for everyone to use.

Join other bookwyrms in recommending books to eachother & sharing your reading list and read list. Or, if you just want to have a place to manage the books you are reading, then this is also the place for you! Either way, everyone is welcome!


We are also a part of the Fedihosting Foundation together with other sites such as Mastodon.world, Lemmy.world and mstd.social

Need help? Contact the admins at info@bookwyrm.world or send a dm to @sigvie@bookwyrm.world here on the local instance!

title: BookWyrm.it
short_description: Comunità Italiana per amanti dei libri. È possibile tenere traccia delle proprie letture, parlare di libri, scrivere recensioni e scoprire cosa leggere prossimamente. Abbiamo sede in Italia (Milano).
description:
Bookwyrm.it è una comunità di amanti dei libri. È possibile tenere traccia delle proprie letture, parlare di libri, scrivere recensioni e scoprire cosa leggere prossimamente.

Leggi una pila di libri all'anno? Vuoi condividere le tue opinioni su quanto leggi? Vuoi leggere di più? Non hai niente da leggere e cerchi ispirazione? Allora Bookwyrm.it fa al caso tuo.

BookWyrm.it è un social per libri creato con software libero, è federato. È un luogo per parlare di libri e letteratura in italiano.
Siamo un'istanza di BookWyrm con sede in Italia. Chiunque può iscriversi e non viene privilegiato alcun genere particolare. È possibile seguire e interagire con gli utenti di altre istanze di BookWyrm e di Mastodon.

Questa è l'istanza italiana bookwyrm per gli appassionati di libri di Mastodon.Uno. Da qui potete Informarvi sui libri, seguite le vostre letture e scoprite cosa stanno leggendo i vostri amici.

È un luogo di incontro per coloro che cercano di espandere i propri orizzonti letterari e di condividere le proprie letture con gli altri. Questa è un'istanza generalista, non viene privilegiato un genere in particolare; i lettori sono semplicemente incoraggiati a esplorare ciò che li entusiasma.

BookWyrm.it è privo di pubblicità, indipendente e federato con altri server in tutto il mondo e con tutte le applicazioni del fediverso.
Siamo impegnati a lungo termine nell'amministrazione 9 istanze del fediverso e 30 servizi liberi dal 2019, e dal 2024 nel mantenimento dell'istanza Bookwyrm.it per assicurare un'esperienza utente reattiva e affidabile.

Se volete seguire il progetto bookwyrm.it e avete domande o richieste abbiamo l'account libri su mastodon .

title: BookWyrm.de
short_description: Mit BookWyrm.de Bücher lesen und gemeinsam besprechen.
description: Diese Instanz erlaubt es euch Bücher zu lesen und gemeinsam zu besprechen.

title: Books of Duck Cafe
short_description: Explore books, authors, genres and publishers in our instance for literary enthusiasts.
description:
Welcome to our BookWyrm instance!

Our goal is to create a safe and supportive environment for discussing books, authors, genres and publishing in-depth.

Feel free to add books, authors, and improve existing content

Thank you! 🌸
